channel.title: Starbound - Streaming now!
channel.description:
I just recently purchased Starbound, which is a game in which you take on the role of a character who’s just fled from their home planet, only to crash-land on another. From there you’ll embark on a quest to survive, discover, explore and fight your way across an infinite universe. The game was released to play in the BETA stage on December 4, which means the game is playable, although it is very likely to come across bugs. With that being said, I was thinking of starting a server up (since there is the ability to play with other people), so I was wondering if anyone else has this game or is consider playing it.
You can read more about it here: http://playstarbound.com/about/
If you are interested in watching me play the game live, you can go here: http://www.twitch.tv/krimdex

item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

LilXCj:

Been playing for a while now. Love it. I especially love the instruments. I wish I knew how to transcribe songs into abc notation

Yeah it’s great!

item.title: Starbound - Streaming now!
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:7, topic:536689”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=655501.msg4389458#msg4389458 date=1386970924]
I’m skeptical about paying for something I know little about. Could anyone get a hacked client so I could test it?
[/quote]

Not really sure how easy that would be since it’s ran through steam. I suggest watching some game play videos on youtube. I can’t stress enough how much I’ve enjoyed it lol[/quote]
You could do the same with Terraria even though it is run through stream, so I don’t see why there would be an issue unless the game itself is just more secure code-wise.
@reyx7, If you have played any game like Terraria, I believe you would like this game.

Read full topic

reyx7:

I’m skeptical about paying for something I know little about. Could anyone get a hacked client so I could test it?

Not really sure how easy that would be since it’s ran through steam. I suggest watching some game play videos on youtube. I can’t stress enough how much I’ve enjoyed it lol

item.title: Starbound - Streaming now!
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

KroniKz_:

Can you tell me more about the game from a players perspective? It looks interesting but is it repetitive?

Well all games are repetitive in a certain fashion, but the only obvious repetition in this game would be the ore collection, as you will need ore to craft things through the game. Besides that, there are several galaxies to explore, bosses to defeat and even a few quests to help you get started with the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Starbound - Streaming now!
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Newty:

I own this game and play on my buddy’s server all the time. This game is AWESOME! Terraria but with more things to do and a cooler story/gameplay

It really is an amazing game, and I encourage anyone that does not have this game to at least give it a chance! I was thinking of getting together a small group of people from this forum and starting up a server, so if you are interested in that just post below.

Read full topic
